> Tucson continues to spin the blade faster and faster until all that cou=
ld be seen is a giant silver blur!  His blade meets Grimlock's blade as he =
angles the Katana to catch the oncoming sword with the sharp side of his ow=
n weapon. Yet the move was only to defend himself not swing out towards the=
m.  The Dinobots may be relentless but if there is a land and defenseless c=
reatures being tormented by intruders, the Silver Dragon will not rest unti=
l the tormentors are brought to justice!   True to his nature, Tucson gives=
 it his all to defend his turf.  
> 
> " You leave me no choice but to figh=
t back!   AND FIGHT I WILL!"
> 

OOC - Just commenting, Sandy, this is read=
ing a bit like overkill to me.  Tuscon has been under four rounds of attack=
 from all five Dinobots, and has not taken a single hit.  He's dodged, bloc=
ked, or evaded more than fifteen to twenty attacks in the combat posts you'=
ve had back and forth, which even for a skilled warrior would be near impos=
sible to do.  Even Megatron was stalemated in direct combat wtih Grimlock, =
and up against all five Dinobots Optimus Prime nearly died.  And Tuscon her=
e is handling them all effortlessly, as you've put into your postgs not eve=
n trying to fight back.  I'm not speaking as a mod, but this is getting a b=
it silly as to how he's able to endlessly avoid every single attack they to=
ss his way, and they're one of the most potent teams the Autobots had as fa=
r as fighting well and together went.
